Spell.Name: Acid Splash
Spell.Additional: DAM: Add extra 1d6 at 5th level, 11th level, and 17th level.

Spell.Name: Aid
Spell.Additional: Each target also increases maximum HP by 5.

Spell.Name: Alarm
Spell.Additional: Audible or silent alarm triggered on entry by those you haven't said can enter

Spell.Name: Alter Self
Spell.Additional: Choose one: breathe/swim underwater, natural weapons, change appearance

Spell.Name: Animal Friendship
Spell.Additional: Charm beasts with INT <= 3; spell fails if you hurt beast

Spell.Name: Animal Messenger
Spell.Additional: Beast will relay 25 word message to a target you describe

Spell.Name: Animal Shapes
Spell.Additional: Transform targets into Large or smaller beasts with CR <= 4

Spell.Name: Animate Dead
Spell.Additional: Creates skeleton or zombie servant that accepts simple directions

Spell.Name: Animate Objects
Spell.Additional: Animate objects to accept simple commands.

Spell.Name: Antilife Shell
Spell.Additional: Erects barrier around you that moves with you. Living creatures cannot enter.

Spell.Name: Antimagic Field
Spell.Additional: Erects a sphere around you in which all magic no longer works.

Spell.Name: Antipathy/Sympathy
Spell.Additional: Target object/creature attracts or repels specifc creature types.

Spell.Name: Arcane Eye
Spell.Additional: Create invisible eye with darkvision(30ft) moves 30ft/rd you can see through.

Spell.Name: Arcane Gate
Spell.Additional: Create two linked portals 10ft. across anybody can travel between.

Spell.Name: Arcane Lock
Spell.Additional: Locks object until password is spoken or dispel/knock. Object break DC +10.

Spell.Name: Armor of Agathys
Spell.Additional: Gain 5 THP. Melee attackers take 5 DAM.

Spell.Name: Arms of Hadar
Spell.Additional: Targets can't take reactions until next turn

Spell.Name: Astral Projection
Spell.Additional: Project to Astral Plane. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Augury
Spell.Additional: See omen predicting results of action taken within 30 minutes.

Spell.Name: Aura of Life
Spell.Additional: Gain necrotic resistance, HEAL 1 HP if at 0 HP, HP max can't go down.

Spell.Name: Aura of Purity
Spell.Additional: Gain poison resist, disease immune, advantage on status saving throws.

Spell.Name: Aura of Vitality
Spell.Additional: Use bonus action to HEAL 1 target in aura.

Spell.Name: Awaken
Spell.Additional: Target with INT <= 3 gaints INT 10 and can speak. Charmed for 30 days.

Spell.Name: Bane
Spell.Additional: Targets' attack rolls and saving throws are deducted 1d4.

Spell.Name: Banishing Smite
Spell.Additional: Target banished if <= 50 HP.

Spell.Name: Banishment
Spell.Additional: Banish target to another plane; native of other plane doesn't return after 1 min.

Spell.Name: Barkskin
Spell.Additional: Target AC is never less than 16 during spell.

Spell.Name: Beacon of Hope
Spell.Additional: Targets get advantage on WIS and death saving throws; heal spells heal max.

Spell.Name: Beast Sense
Spell.Additional: Use action to see/hear whatever beast does. Use action to return.

Spell.Name: Bestow Curse
Spell.Additional: Curse target. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Bigby's Hand
Spell.Additional: Create giant hand to do various things. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Blade Barrier
Spell.Additional: Creatures entering wall/circle area take DAM.

Spell.Name: Blade Ward
Spell.Additional: Gain resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing DMG from weapons.

Spell.Name: Bless
Spell.Additional: Targets add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws.

Spell.Name: Blight
Spell.Additional: Plants have disadvantage on save and take max DAM.

Spell.Name: Blinding Smite
Spell.Additional: Next melee attack target takes DAM and is blinded until spell ends.

Spell.Name: Blindness/Deafness
Spell.Additional: Target becomes blind or deaf (your choice).

Spell.Name: Blink
Spell.Additional: Roll 11 or higher to go to Ethereal plane between turns; reapper within 10ft.

Spell.Name: Blur
Spell.Additional: Creatures relying on sight have disadvantage to attack.

Spell.Name: Branding Smite
Spell.Additional: Target becomes visible, sheds dim light.

Spell.Name: Burning Hands
Spell.Additional: Flammable objects ignite.

Spell.Name: Call Lightning
Spell.Additional: Targets take DAM each round. Can change targets each round.

Spell.Name: Calm Emotions
Spell.Additional: Suppress charm effects or hostility on target.

Spell.Name: Chain Lightning
Spell.Additional: Bolt hits one target then forks to up to 3 others.

Spell.Name: Charm Person
Spell.Additional: Charm target so it treats you as friendly. Gets advantage to save if fighting you.

Spell.Name: Chill Touch
Spell.Additional: Extra 1d6 DAM at 5th level, 11th level, and 17th level. Can't regain HP.

Spell.Name: Chromatic Orb
Spell.Additional: Choose type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

Spell.Name: Circle of Power
Spell.Additional: Friendlies: advantage on saving throws against magic/effects. No half DAM.

Spell.Name: Clairvoyance
Spell.Additional: Create sensor in area you can see or hear through.

Spell.Name: Clone
Spell.Additional: Create clone of living person; soul transfers to clone if original dies.

Spell.Name: Cloud of Daggers
Spell.Additional: DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area.

Spell.Name: Cloudkill
Spell.Additional: DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area. Fog moves away 10 ft. per turn.

Spell.Name: Color Spray
Spell.Additional: Blinds 6d10 HP worth of creatures, starting with lowest HP.

Spell.Name: Command
Spell.Additional: Speak 1 word command to target. Can't cause harm. Doesn't affect undead.

Spell.Name: Commune
Spell.Additional: Ask 3 yes/no questions that are answered by deity. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Commune with Nature
Spell.Additional: Gain knowledge of the land around you. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Compelled Duel
Spell.Additional: Compel target to attack you one-on-one. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Comprehend Languages
Spell.Additional: Know literal meaning of any speech. Understand written words while touching.

Spell.Name: Compulsion
Spell.Additional: Compel targets to move in specified non-hazardous direction.

Spell.Name: Cone of Cold
Spell.Additional: Creatures killed become frozen statues.

Spell.Name: Confusion
Spell.Additional: Targets can't take reactions and do random actions. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Conjure Animals
Spell.Additional: Summon fey spirits as creatures (total CR <= 2) that act as a group.

Spell.Name: Conjure Barrage
Spell.Additional: Damage type is same as ammo/weapon used as component.

Spell.Name: Conjure Celestial
Spell.Additional: Summon celestial CR <= 4. Obeys commands that don't violate alignment.

Spell.Name: Conjure Elemental
Spell.Additional: Summon elemental CR <= 5. Obeys commands. Hostile if control is lost.

Spell.Name: Conjure Fey
Spell.Additional: Summon fey CR <= 6. Obeys commands. Hostile if control is lost.

Spell.Name: Conjure Minor Elementals
Spell.Additional: Summon elementals (total CR <= 2) that obey commands.

Spell.Name: Conjure Volley
Spell.Additional: Damage type is same as ammo/weapon used as component.

Spell.Name: Conjure Woodland Beings
Spell.Additional: Summon fey creatures (CR <= 2) that obey commands.

Spell.Name: Contact Other Plane
Spell.Additional: Contact extraplanar being. YOU make save. 1-word answers to 5 questions.

Spell.Name: Contagion
Spell.Additional: Give creature a disease. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Contingency
Spell.Additional: Spell <= 5th level activates when condition occurs. That spell's slot used too.

Spell.Name: Continual Flame
Spell.Additional: Heatless flame comes from object. Can be covered but not snuffed out.

Spell.Name: Control Water
Spell.Additional: Control water. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Control Weather
Spell.Additional: Control the weather. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Cordon of Arrows
Spell.Additional: Ammo fired at creatures within 30 ft. Spell ends when ammo gone.

Spell.Name: Counterspell
Spell.Additional: Interrupt spell <= 4th. You make casting ability check (DC 10 + spell level).

Spell.Name: Create Food and Water
Spell.Additional: Create 45 lbs. of bland, nourishing food for 24 hours and 30 gallons of water.

Spell.Name: Create or Destroy Water
Spell.Target: 10 gal. water/30 ft. cube of fog
Spell.Additional: Create/destroy 10 gal. of water or 30 ft. cube of rain/fog.

Spell.Name: Create Undead
Spell.Additional: Create undead to serve you for 24 hours. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Creation
Spell.Component: bit of matter you want to make
Spell.Additional: Make nonliving object no larger than 5 ft. cube. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Crown of Madness
Spell.Additional: Charm humanoid to attack your target of choice. Use action to keep control.

Spell.Name: Crusader's Mantle
Spell.Additional: Nonhostiles in aura deal an extra 1d4 radiant DAM.

Spell.Name: Cure Wounds
Spell.Additional: HEAL: 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier. No effect on undead or constructs.

Spell.Name: Dancing Lights
Spell.Additional: Create 4 glowing, hovering objects that shed light out 10 ft. Can move 60 ft.

Spell.Name: Darkness
Spell.Component: bat fur and pitch or coal
Spell.Additional: Creates darkness normal light can't dispel. Dispels light spells <= 2nd level.

Spell.Name: Darkvision
Spell.Additional: Grants creature darkvision (60 ft.) but can't see in Darkness aura.

Spell.Name: Daylight
Spell.Additional: Creates bright light. Dispels darkness spells <= 3rd level it overlaps with.

Spell.Name: Death Ward
Spell.Additional: 1 use: Target drops to 1 HP instead of 0 HP or negates instant kill effect.

Spell.Name: Delayed Blast Fireball
Spell.Component: tiny ball of guano and sulfur
Spell.Additional: Creates spot where fireball will erupt. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Demiplane
Spell.Additional: Create door to 30 ft. cubic room in demiplane. Trapped if there when spell ends.

Spell.Name: Destructive Wave
Spell.Additional: Targets in circle take thunder DAM, then radiant or necrotic DAM; go prone.

Spell.Name: Detect Evil and Good
Spell.Additional: Know location of aberration,celestial,elemental,fey,fiend,undead,(un)holy ground.

Spell.Name: Detect Magic
Spell.Additional: Sense presence of magic. Use action to see auras around creatures/objects.

Spell.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
Spell.Additional: Sense location and type of disease, poison, or poisonous creature.

Spell.Name: Detect Thoughts
Spell.Additional: Read thoughts of those around you. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Dimension Door
Spell.Additional: Teleport yourself and ally to location. If occupied, 4d6 force DAM and spell fails.

Spell.Name: Disguise Self
Spell.Additional: Create illusion to appear as someone else. Foiled by Investigation vs. spell DC.

Spell.Name: Disintegrate
Spell.Additional: If target drops to 0 HP, is disintegrated. Only revived by True Resurrection.

Spell.Name: Dispel Evil and Good
Spell.Additional: Fey,undead,extraplanar creatures have disadvantaged attacks. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Dispel Magic
Spell.Additional: End spell <= 3rd level. For >= 4th level, casting ability check DC=10+spell level.

Spell.Name: Dissonant Whispers
Spell.Additional: Target immediately uses reaction to move as far away as possible.

Spell.Name: Divination
Spell.Additional: Question about one event in next 7 days answered by phrase or omen.

Spell.Name: Divine Favor
Spell.Additional: Your weapon attacks deal extra 1d4 radiant DAM on a hit.

Spell.Name: Divine Word
Spell.Additional: Targets suffer effects based on their current HP. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Dominate Beast
Spell.Additional: Charm beast to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

Spell.Name: Dominate Monster
Spell.Additional: Charm monster to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

Spell.Name: Dominate Person
Spell.Additional: Charm humanoid to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

Spell.Name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
Spell.Additional: Speak item name and crush gem to summon object unless it's held by other.

Spell.Name: Dream
Spell.Additional: Shape creature's dreams. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Druidcraft
Spell.Additional: Create minor druidic effect. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Earthquake
Spell.Component: piece of dirt, rock, and clay
Spell.Additional: Create a seismic disturbance with various effects. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Eldritch Blast
Spell.Additional: Beam. 2 beams at 5th level, 3 at 11th, 4 at 17th. Can choose different targets.

Spell.Name: Elemental Weapon
Spell.Additional: Weapon is +1 to hit and +1d4 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder DAM.

Spell.Name: Enhance Ability
Spell.Component: fur or feather from a beast
Spell.Additional: Target creature gains a beneficial effect. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Enlarge/Reduce
Spell.Additional: Enlarge or reduce target. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Ensnaring Strike
Spell.Additional: Restrain target. Large and bigger creatures have advantage to save.

Spell.Name: Entangle
Spell.Additional: Creatures become restrained.Use action to use STR against spell DC to escape.

Spell.Name: Enthrall
Spell.Additional: Disadvantage to see anybody but you; attacked ones have advantage to save.

Spell.Name: Etherealness
Spell.Additional: Become ethereal. Move up/down at half speed. Can't see past 60 ft.

Spell.Name: Evard's Black Tentacles
Spell.Additional: Also restrained. Restrained take DAM every turn. STR/DEX check to get free.

Spell.Name: Expeditious Retreat
Spell.Additional: You can take Dash as a bonus action until spell ends.

Spell.Name: Eyebite
Spell.Additional: Affect targets negatively. New target each turn. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Fabricate
Spell.Additional: Convert raw materials into object no bigger than 5 ft. cube.

Spell.Name: Faerie Fire
Spell.Additional: Objects/creatures in cube are outlined in light and are attacked with advantage.

Spell.Name: False Life
Spell.Additional: You gain 1d4+4 temp HP.

Spell.Name: Fear
Spell.Additional: Targets drop everything and use Dash to run away. WIS save once out of sight.

Spell.Name: Feather Fall
Spell.Component: small feather or piece of down
Spell.Additional: Targets' descent slows to 60 ft. per round, takes no DAM, and can land on feet.

Spell.Name: Feeblemind
Spell.Additional: Creature INT and CHA scores become 1. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Feign Death
Spell.Additional: Creature appears dead. Resists all non-psychic DMG. Disease/poison delayed.

Spell.Name: Find Familiar
Spell.Additional: Gain the service of a familiar. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Find Steed
Spell.Additional: Summons a spirit in the form of a steed. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Find the Path
Spell.Additional: Find the shortest, most direct route to a place you are familiar with.

Spell.Name: Find Traps
Spell.Additional: Sense the presence (not location) of any magical or mundane trap nearby.

Spell.Name: Finger of Death
Spell.Additional: Humanoids killed rise as a zombie next turn permanently under your control.

Spell.Name: Fire Bolt
Spell.Additional: DAM at 5th level: 2d10, at 11th level: 3d10, at 17th level: 4d10.

Spell.Name: Fire Shield
Spell.Component: bit of phosphorous or a firefly
Spell.Additional: Choose warm or chill shield. Melee attackers take DMG. Light out 10 ft./20 ft.

Spell.Name: Fire Storm
Spell.Additional: Each cube must face at least one other cube. Can choose not to affect plants.

Spell.Name: Fireball
Spell.Component: tiny ball of guano and sulfur
Spell.Additional: Fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects.

Spell.Name: Flame Blade
Spell.Additional: Create fiery scimitar that sheds bright light 10ft. and dim light for another 10ft.

Spell.Name: Flame Strike
Spell.Additional: Creatures take fire and radiant damage.

Spell.Name: Flaming Sphere
Spell.Additional: Creatures next to spheres at end of turn take DAM. Move spheres 30 ft.

Spell.Name: Flesh to Stone
Spell.Component: pinch of lime, water, and earth
Spell.Additional: Restrained on first fail. Petrified after 3 fails.

Spell.Name: Fly
Spell.Additional: Target gains fly (60 ft.). Fall if spell ends while in air.

Spell.Name: Fog Cloud
Spell.Additional: Creates a foggy sphere. Can be banished by moderate wind.

Spell.Name: Forbiddance
Spell.Additional: Can't teleport/gate into area. A creature type you choose takes DMG in area.

Spell.Name: Forcecage
Spell.Additional: Creatures stuck in cage can only leave using magic after CHA save.

Spell.Name: Foresight
Spell.Additional: Not surprised. Advantage:attacks,checks,saves. Disadvantage getting attacked.

Spell.Name: Freedom of Movement
Spell.Additional: Immune to difficult terrain,slow,paralyze,restrain. Spend 5ft to escape restrain.

Spell.Name: Friends
Spell.Additional: Advantage on CHA checks to target, who knows magic used once spell ends.

Spell.Name: Gaseous Form
Spell.Component: bit of gauze and wisp of smoke
Spell.Additional: Cloud form. Fly(10ft.). Resist nonmagical DMG. STR/DEX/CON save advantage.

Spell.Name: Gate
Spell.Additional: Create portal to precise location on another plane or near a specific person.

Spell.Name: Geas
Spell.Additional: Target must perform task you set. 5d10 psychic DAM whenever it disobeys.

Spell.Name: Gentle Repose
Spell.Component: salt and 1 cp on each eye
Spell.Additional: Preserves corpse. Extends time limit of Raise Dead spell.

Spell.Name: Giant Insect
Spell.Additional: Turn insects into giant insects that obey your commands.

Spell.Name: Glibness
Spell.Additional: Can replace CHA check rolls with a 15. Spells always detect you telling truth.

Spell.Name: Globe of Invulnerability
Spell.Additional: Spells <= 5th level cannot affect those within the globe.

Spell.Name: Glyph of Warding
Spell.Additional: Create a magical trap. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Goodberry
Spell.Additional: Create <= 10 berries that HEAL 1 HP each. Expire after 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Grasping Vine
Spell.Additional: Create vine that lashes out 30 ft. away. Targets failing save pulled 20 ft. to vine.

Spell.Name: Grease
Spell.Additional: Creatures in area or entering area fall prone if they fail DEX save.

Spell.Name: Greater Invisibility
Spell.Additional: Become invisible until spell ends.

Spell.Name: Greater Restoration
Spell.Additional: End a debilitating effect on target. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Guardian of Faith
Spell.Additional: Create spectral guardian that attacks hostiles. Leaves after dealing 60 DAM.

Spell.Name: Guards and Wards
Spell.Additional: Protect an area of space. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Guidance
Spell.Additional: Once, add 1d4 to an ability check.

Spell.Name: Guiding Bolt
Spell.Additional: Next attack roll against target before end of your next turn has advantage.

Spell.Name: Gust of Wind
Spell.Additional: Push targets 15 ft. in directon of wind. Creatures move half speed against wind.

Spell.Name: Hail of Thorns
Spell.Additional: Target hit by ranged attack and those adjacent who fail save hit by thorns.

Spell.Name: Hallow
Spell.Additional: Infuse area with holy or unholy power. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Spell.Component: stone, twig, bit of green plant
Spell.Additional: Make natural terrain seem like other terrain. Investigation check to disbelieve.

Spell.Name: Harm
Spell.Additional: Max HP reduced by same amount as DAM. Target cannot fall below 1 HP.

Spell.Name: Haste
Spell.Additional: Doubles speed. +2 AC. Advantage on DEX saves. Additional action to Dash.

Spell.Name: Heal
Spell.Additional: Ends blindness, deafness, any diseases. No effect on constructs/undead.

Spell.Name: Healing Word
Spell.Additional: Target HEAL 1d4 + spellcasting ability. No effect on constructs/undead.

Spell.Name: Heat Metal
Spell.Component: piece of iron and a flame
Spell.Additional: Heat metallic objects including weapons and armor. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Hellish Rebuke
Spell.Additional: Magical counterattack to taking damage.

Spell.Name: Heroes' Feast
Spell.Additional: Cure:disease,poison.Immune:poison,fright.HP max +2d10,WIS save advantage.

Spell.Name: Heroism
Spell.Additional: Immune to being frightened. Temp HP equal to casting ability modifier each turn.

Spell.Name: Hex
Spell.Additional: Target takes 1d6 necrotic DAM when you hit it;disadvantage on ability of choice.

Spell.Name: Hold Monster
Spell.Additional: Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn. Doesn't work on undead.

Spell.Name: Hold Person
Spell.Additional: Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn.

Spell.Name: Holy Aura
Spell.Additional: Aura helps allies and hurts enemies. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Hunger of Hadar
Spell.Additional: Start turn in area: 2d6 cold DAM.End turn in area: DEX save or 2d6 acid DAM.

Spell.Name: Hunter's Mark
Spell.Additional: Mark quarry. Extra 1d6 DAM on weapon hit. Advantage on rolls to find it.

Spell.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
Spell.Additional: Creatures charmed, incapacitated, speed = 0. Spell ends on DAM or shaking.

Spell.Name: Ice Storm
Spell.Component: pinch of dust, drop of water
Spell.Additional: Storm's area of effect becomes difficult terrain until end of next turn.

Spell.Name: Identify
Spell.Additional: Learn what an item is and what spells affect it.

Spell.Name: Illusory Script
Spell.Additional: Write magical script on surface that only designated people can read.

Spell.Name: Imprisonment
Spell.Additional: Magically restrain a creature. See sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Incendiary Cloud
Spell.Additional: Targets make save when cloud created or entering or exiting it. Cloud move: 10ft.

Spell.Name: Inflict Wounds
Spell.Additional: Inflict necrotic damage on target.

Spell.Name: Insect Plague
Spell.Component: bit of sugar, grain, and fat
Spell.Additional: Targets make save when swarm created or entering or exiting it.

Spell.Name: Invisibility
Spell.Additional: Target becomes invisible. Ends if target attacks or casts a spell.

Spell.Name: Jump
Spell.Additional: Target's jump distance tripled until spell ends.

Spell.Name: Knock
Spell.Additional: Open mundane lock or suppress an Arcane Lock for 10 minutes. Loud knock.

Spell.Name: Legend Lore
Spell.Additional: Learn lore about target. Information is accurate but might use figurative words.

Spell.Name: Leomund's Secret Chest
Spell.Additional: Transport chest back and forth from Ethereal Plane using replica.

Spell.Name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
Spell.Additional: Protect <= 9 creatures in hut from spells, creatures, elements.

Spell.Name: Lesser Restoration
Spell.Additional: End one disease or condition (blind, deaf, paralyzed, poisoned) on target.

Spell.Name: Levitate
Spell.Component: small leather loop or golden wire
Spell.Additional: Target <= 500 lbs. floats 20 ft.Can move up/down 20ft./turn. Floats down on end.

Spell.Name: Light
Spell.Additional: Object sheds light in 20 ft. radious. Hostile targets get DEX save.

Spell.Name: Lightning Arrow
Spell.Additional: Creatures within 10 ft. of initial target also take 2d8 DAM (DEX save for half).

Spell.Name: Lightning Bolt
Spell.Component: bit of fur and glass rod
Spell.Additional: Lightning ignites flammable objects.

Spell.Name: Locate Animals or Plants
Spell.Additional: Name a kind of beast or plant and find the nearest one within 5 miles.

Spell.Name: Locate Creature
Spell.Additional: Sense creature direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.

Spell.Name: Locate Object
Spell.Additional: Sense object direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.

Spell.Name: Longstrider
Spell.Additional: Target's speed increases by 10 ft.

Spell.Name: Mage Armor
Spell.Additional: If target isn't wearing armor, its base AC becomes 13 + DEX modifier.

Spell.Name: Mage Hand
Spell.Additional: Create spectral hand that manipulates objects. Can pick up <= 10 lbs.

Spell.Name: Magic Circle
Spell.Additional: Hinder one creature type within cylinder. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Magic Jar
Spell.Additional: Your soul enters an external object. See sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Magic Missile
Spell.Additional: You choose the target for each dart that does 1d4+1 DAM.

Spell.Name: Magic Mouth
Spell.Additional: Magic mouth repeats <= 25 word message once condition is met.

Spell.Name: Magic Weapon
Spell.Additional: Nonmagical weapon becomes +1.

Spell.Name: Major Image
Spell.Additional: Create image of object including sounds, smells. Investigation check to foil.

Spell.Name: Mass Cure Wounds
Spell.Additional: Creatures HEAL 3d8 + casting ability modifier. No effect on undead/constructs.

Spell.Name: Mass Heal
Spell.Additional: Targets HEAL total of 700 HP and cured of diseases, blindness, and deafness.

Spell.Name: Mass Healing Word
Spell.Additional: Targets HEAL 1d4 + casting ability modifier. No effect on undead/constructs.

Spell.Name: Mass Suggestion
Spell.Additional: Make creatures accept reasonable sounding suggestions. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Maze
Spell.Additional: Target uses action each turn to make INT check (DC 20) to escape.

Spell.Name: Meld into Stone
Spell.Additional: Meld into stone walls or large stone objects. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Melf's Acid Arrow
Spell.Additional: Half DAM on miss. On hit, target also takes 2d4 acid DAM at end of next turn.

Spell.Name: Mending
Spell.Additional: Mends one break or tear no larger than 1ft. in a mundane object.

Spell.Name: Message
Spell.Additional: Point at target and whisper a message. They can whisper a response.

Spell.Name: Meteor Swarm
Spell.Additional: Also damages objects and ignites flammable objects.

Spell.Name: Mind Blank
Spell.Additional: Target immune to psychic damage, charm, mind reading, divinations.

Spell.Name: Minor Illusion
Spell.Additional: Create illusory sound or image. Investigation check against spell DC to detect.

Spell.Name: Mirage Arcane
Spell.Additional: Create audo,visual,tactile, and olfactory illusion. Only Truesight can detect.

Spell.Name: Mirror Image
Spell.Additional: Create duplicates that make you harder to hit. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Mislead
Spell.Additional: Become invisible and create illusory double. Use action to move your double.

Spell.Name: Misty Step
Spell.Additional: Teleport <= 30 ft. away to unoccupied location.

Spell.Name: Modify Memory
Spell.Additional: Reshape another creature's memories. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Moonbeam
Spell.Additional: DAM taken entering/start turn in beam. Shapechanges disadvantage to save.

Spell.Name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
Spell.Additional: Spectral hound guards area and can attack hostiles. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion
Spell.Additional: Summon portal to 50000 cubic ft. mansion with food for 100 people.

Spell.Name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
Spell.Additional: Create magically secure area. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Mordenkainen's Sword
Spell.Additional: Use bonus action each turn to move sword <= 20 ft. and attack again.

Spell.Name: Move Earth
Spell.Additional: Reshape dirt, sand, or clay. Can move to different square after 10 minutes.

Spell.Name: Nondetection
Spell.Additional: Hide target from all divination and scrying magic.

Spell.Name: Nystul's Magic Aura
Spell.Additional: Divination spells reveal false info about target. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
Spell.Additional: Water freezes. Can give globe to another who fires it and spell takes effect then.

Spell.Name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
Spell.Additional: Trap creature in sphere. Sphere only destroyed by Disintegrate spell.

Spell.Name: Otto's Irresistable Dance
Spell.Additional: No movement.Disadvantage on DEX saves and attacks.Use action to WIS save.

Spell.Name: Pass without Trace
Spell.Additional: Targets get +10 to Stealth checks and can only be tracked by magic.

Spell.Name: Passwall
Spell.Additional: Create 5ft wide, 8ft tall,20ft deep opening in wall, ceiling, or floor.

Spell.Name: Phantasmal Force
Spell.Additional: Affect target with illusion. Can DAM for 1d6 Psychic. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Phantasmal Killer
Spell.Additional: Target is frightened and takes DAM at start of turn if it doesn't save.

Spell.Name: Phantom Steed
Spell.Additional: You and 1 other can ride phantom steed. Speed=100ft or 10mph (13 fast).

Spell.Name: Planar Ally
Spell.Additional: Ask otherworldly entity for aid. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Planar Binding
Spell.Additional: Bind celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to serve you for spell duration.

Spell.Name: Plane Shift
Spell.Additional: Transport to another plane. You specify general location or teleportation circle.

Spell.Name: Plant Growth
Spell.Additional: Cast short term (creatures move 1/4 speed) or long term (double food yield).

Spell.Name: Poison Spray
Spell.Additional: DAM increase. 5th level: 2d12, 11th level: 3d12, 17th level: 4d12.

Spell.Name: Polymorph
Spell.Additional: Transform creature's form. All stats change. Limited to actions of new form.

Spell.Name: Power Word Heal
Spell.Additional: Target also cured of charm, fright, paralyze, or stun. Use reaction to stand up.

Spell.Name: Power Word Kill
Spell.Additional: If target has <= 100 HP, it dies instantly. No effect otherwise. No saving throw.

Spell.Name: Power Word Stun
Spell.Additional: Target <= 150 HP is stunned. Nothing otherwise. CON save at end of turn to end.

Spell.Name: Prayer of Healing
Spell.Additional: Targets HEAL 2d8 + casting ability modifier HP. No effect on undead/constructs.

Spell.Name: Prestidigitation
Spell.Additional: Create minor magical effect. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Prismatic Spray
Spell.Additional: Send a rainbow of negative effects at enemies. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Prismatic Wall
Spell.Additional: Create multicolored barrier with various effects. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Produce Flame
Spell.Additional: Create flame. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8, 11th level: 3d8, 17th level: 4d8.

Spell.Name: Programmed Illusion
Spell.Additional: Create illusion that performs specific action triggered by specific action.

Spell.Name: Project Image
Spell.Additional: Create image of self you can see/hear/speak/move (x2 speed) through.

Spell.Name: Protection from Energy
Spell.Additional: Creature gains resistance to one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

Spell.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
Spell.Additional: Protect against certain types of creatures. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Protection from Poison
Spell.Additional: Target has 1 poison neutralized, advantage on poison save, resists poison DAM.

Spell.Name: Purify Food and Drink
Spell.Additional: All nonmagical food and drink in range is rendered free of poison and disease.

Spell.Name: Raise Dead
Spell.Additional: Return target to life with 1 HP. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Rary's Telepathic Bond
Spell.Additional: Targets can communicate telepathically with each other, but not to other planes.

Spell.Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Spell.Additional: Target deals 1/2 DMG with STR weapon attacks. CON save to end at turn's end.

Spell.Name: Ray of Frost
Spell.Additional: Speed -10ft. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8, 11th level: 3d8, 17th level: 4d8.

Spell.Name: Ray of Sickness
Spell.Additional: Target also makes CON save. On fail, poisoned until end of next turn.

Spell.Name: Regenerate
Spell.Additional: Target HEAL 1 HP at start of every turn. Severed parts return after 2 minutes.

Spell.Name: Reincarnate
Spell.Additional: Resurrect dead humanoid into a random humanoid body. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Remove Curse
Spell.Additional: Remove curse creature or break object's curse attunement to any target.

Spell.Name: Resistance
Spell.Additional: Once before spell ends, add 1d4 to a saving throw. Roll before or after save.

Spell.Name: Resurrection
Spell.Additional: Resurrect dead creaature. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Reverse Gravity
Spell.Additional: Creatures fall upwards, taking falling damage. Fall again once spell ends.

Spell.Name: Revivify
Spell.Additional: Raise creature that died within 1 minute to 1 HP. Doesn't restore missing parts.

Spell.Name: Rope Trick
Spell.Additional: Climb rope to other space that can hide 8 Medium creatures. Can see outside.

Spell.Name: Sacred Flame
Spell.Additional: No cover. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8, 11th level: 3d8, 17th level: 4d8.

Spell.Name: Sanctuary
Spell.Additional: Those choosing to attack target must make WIS save or choose new target.

Spell.Name: Scorching Ray
Spell.Additional: Shoot 3 rays at up to 3 targets.

Spell.Name: Scrying
Spell.Additional: Spy on a target located on the same plane as you. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Searing Smite
Spell.Additional: Target takes initial DAM and CON save at start of each turn or take 1d6 fire.

Spell.Name: See Invisibility
Spell.Component: pinch of talc and silver powder
Spell.Additional: See invisible and ethereal creatures.

Spell.Name: Seeming
Spell.Additional: Disguise willing or unwillig creatures as other similar creatures, including outfits.

Spell.Name: Sending
Spell.Component: short piece of fine copper wire
Spell.Additional: Send <= 25 word message to known creature. Get similar reply.

Spell.Name: Sequester
Spell.Additional: Hide target from detection, falls into suspended animation. Condition can end it.

Spell.Name: Shapechange
Spell.Additional: Assume the form of a different creature. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Shatter
Spell.Additional: Inorganic creatures have disadvantage to save. Objects take DAM too.

Spell.Name: Shield
Spell.Additional: Gain +5 bonus to AC, including triggering attack. Negates Magic Missile attacks.

Spell.Name: Shield of Faith
Spell.Additional: Target gains +2 bonus to AC.

Spell.Name: Shillelagh
Spell.Additional: Use casting ability instead of STR for attack,damage. Weapon does 1d8 DMG.

Spell.Name: Shocking Grasp
Spell.Additional: Target can't take reactions until next turn. Advantage if target has metal armor.

Spell.Name: Silence
Spell.Additional: Creatures in area are deafened, immune to thunder DMG, can't cast verbally.

Spell.Name: Silent Image
Spell.Additional: Create visual-only illusion. Use action to make it move. Investigation to discover.

Spell.Name: Simulacrum
Spell.Additional: Create duplicate of beast or humanoid that obeys your commands.

Spell.Name: Sleep
Spell.Additional: 5d8 total HP of creatures in area fall asleep. Go in order of lowest HP to hightest.

Spell.Name: Sleet Storm
Spell.Component: pinch of dust, drops of water
Spell.Additional: Difficult terrain.Each turn,DEX save or fall prone,CON save or lose concentration.

Spell.Name: Slow
Spell.Additional: Affected creatures become slowed. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Spare the Dying
Spell.Additional: Stabilize dying creature. No effect on undead or constructs.

Spell.Name: Speak with Animals
Spell.Additional: Understand and speak to beasts. Get info about nearby locations and monsters.

Spell.Name: Speak with Dead
Spell.Additional: Ask corpse <= 5 questions. Get brief, cryptic answers. Can be lies.

Spell.Name: Speak with Plants
Spell.Additional: Animate plants to communicate with and perform tasks. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Spider Climb
Spell.Additional: Target can walk on walls or ceiling. Climbing speed becomes walking speed.

Spell.Name: Spike Growth
Spell.Additional: Difficult terrain. Moving into or within area takes 2d4 piercing DAM per 5 ft.

Spell.Name: Spirit Guardian
Spell.Additional: Enemy creature speed halved. DMG on enter area: necrotic if evil, radiant if not.

Spell.Name: Spiritual Weapon
Spell.Additional: Magical weapon does 1d8 + casting ability DMG. Can move 20 ft. per turn.

Spell.Name: Staggering Smite
Spell.Additional: WIS save or disadvantage on attack & ability checks; can't take reactions.

Spell.Name: Stinking Cloud
Spell.Additional: Creatures that need to breathe spend turn retching. Wind disperses cloud.

Spell.Name: Stone Shape
Spell.Additional: Reshape stone into any rough shape you wish.

Spell.Name: Stoneskin
Spell.Additional: Target gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing DMG.

Spell.Name: Storm of Vengeance
Spell.Additional: Magical storm attacks targets in range. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Suggestion
Spell.Additional: Target follows reasonable course of action you suggest. Can specify conditions.

Spell.Name: Sunbeam
Spell.Additional: Creatures are blinded until your next turn. Use your action to make a new line.

Spell.Name: Sunburst
Spell.Additional: Creatures are blinded for 1 minute (CON save at end of turn to end).

Spell.Name: Swift Quiver
Spell.Additional: Quiver produces endless ammo.Use bonus action for 2 attacks using ammo.

Spell.Name: Symbol
Spell.Additional: Inscribe harmful magical glyph on surface. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
Spell.Additional: Target (INT > 4) is prone, incapacitated, can't stand. WIS save each turn to end.

Spell.Name: Telekinesis
Spell.Additional: Move objects or creatures with your mind. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Telepathy
Spell.Additional: Telepathically communicate words, sounds, images with target (INT >= 1).

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Additional: Teleport yourself and willing creatures to a distant location. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Teleportation Circle
Spell.Additional: Any stepping inside circle teleport to permanent teleportation circle.

Spell.Name: Tenser's Floating Disk
Spell.Additional: Create floating disk that holds 500 lbs and stays within 20 ft. of you.

Spell.Name: Thaumaturgy
Spell.Additional: Create minor magical effect. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Thorn Whip
Spell.Additional: Pulled 10 ft to root. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d6, 11th level: 3d6, 17th level: 4d6.

Spell.Name: Thunderous Smite
Spell.Additional: Attack target takes extra thunder DAM and STR save or pushed 10 ft. and prone.

Spell.Name: Thunderwave
Spell.Additional: Creatures failing save and objects pushed 10 ft. Boom heard for 300 ft.

Spell.Name: Time Stop
Spell.Additional: Stop time. Take 1d4+1 turns alone. Spell ends if you affect others in any way.

Spell.Name: Tongues
Spell.Additional: Target understands any spoken language and is understood by everyone else.

Spell.Name: Transport via Plants
Spell.Additional: Enter one plant and emerge from another on same plane you've encountered.

Spell.Name: Tree Stride
Spell.Additional: Enter one tree and emerge from another 500 ft. away. Use once per round.

Spell.Name: True Polymorph
Spell.Additional: Transform a creature/object into a different creature/object. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: True Resurrection
Spell.Additional: Resurrect creature that didn't die of old age. Heals all wounds, effects, etc.

Spell.Name: True Seeing
Spell.Additional: Target creature gains truesight, sees secret doors, Ethereal Plane. Range 120 ft.

Spell.Name: True Strike
Spell.Additional: Next turn you gain advantage on first attack against the target.

Spell.Name: Tsunami
Spell.Target: 300 ft x 300 ft x 50 ft water
Spell.Additional: Creatures make STR save to avoid more damage (1d10 less DMG each round).

Spell.Name: Unseen Servant
Spell.Component: piece of string, bit of wood
Spell.Additional: Create invisible force that can perform simple, menial tasks for you.

Spell.Name: Vampiric Touch
Spell.Additional: Each time you hit a target, you also HEAL half of the DAM you cause.

Spell.Name: Vicious Mockery
Spell.Additional: Disadvantage to attack.DAM increase.5th level:2d4,11th level:3d4,17th level:4d4

Spell.Name: Wall of Fire
Spell.Additional: Those entering or ending turn on one side of the wall take 5d8 fire DAM.

Spell.Name: Wall of Force
Spell.Additional: Create impenetrable wall (even into Ethereal Plane) only unmade by Disintegrate.

Spell.Name: Wall of Ice
Spell.Additional: Ice:AC 12, 30 HP. Moving through ice:take 5d6 cold DAM or CON save for half.

Spell.Name: Wall of Stone
Spell.Additional: Create wall of stone or other stone structure. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Wall of Thorns
Spell.Additional: Move through wall at 1/4 speed and take 7d8 slashing DAM (DEX save for half).

Spell.Name: Warding Bond
Spell.Additional: Target (60ft) has +1 AC and saves, resistance to all DAM, shares DAM with you.

Spell.Name: Water Breathing
Spell.Component: short reed or piece of straw
Spell.Additional: Creatures gain ability to breathe underwater using normal respiration.

Spell.Name: Water Walk
Spell.Additional: Creaturess walk on liquid, rise 60 ft. per round if under. Still take other damage.

Spell.Name: Web
Spell.Additional: Every turn:DEX save or restrain;STR save to escape.Burning webs:2d4 fire DAM.

Spell.Name: Weird
Spell.Additional: Affected creatures make WIS saves each turn and take DAM until they save.

Spell.Name: Wind Walk
Spell.Additional: Fly speed: 300 ft. Resist weapons.Only Dash in cloud form. Can revert to normal.

Spell.Name: Wind Wall
Spell.Additional: Strong wind keeps gases, flying creatures, projectiles, gaseous creatures away.

Spell.Name: Wish
Spell.Additional: Replicate and spell <= 8th level or other powerful effect granted. See Sourcebook.

Spell.Name: Witch Bolt
Spell.Component: twig from tree struck by lightning
Spell.Additional: Use action to auto hit target hit last round for 1d12 lightning DAM if in range.

Spell.Name: Word of Recall
Spell.Additional: Instantly teleport to sanctuary you select during prep associated with your deity.

Spell.Name: Wrathful Smite
Spell.Additional: Target hit also makes WIS save or is frightened. WIS save to end effect.

Spell.Name: Zone of Truth
Spell.Additional: You know which fail saves. They can't lie but know of spell and can be evasive.
